[束]
Ideogram ( 指事 ) – bag tied at both ends (earlier forms were often vertically symmetric). See also 東 and 柬 .

[朿]
Pictogram ( 象形 ) – a tree 木 with thorns.
Alternatively, according to Ji Xusheng (2012) , it is a pictogram ( 象形 ) depicting a three-pointed spear.

[刺]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *sʰeɡs, *sʰeɡ ): phonetic 朿 ( OC *sʰeɡs ) + semantic 刂 ( “ knife ” ) .

[赤]
Ideogrammic compound ( 會意 / 会意 ): 大 ( “ person, big ” ) + 火 ( “ fire ” ) – the color of fire (a person by a fire). The original version is 𤆍 .
The man on top is simplified as 土 as in 去 and 走 (< 𧺆 ). The fire is stylized as well, but an intermediate and obsolete variant is 灻 .
